title: Implement Secure Login System
description: As a portal user, I want a secure login system with multi-factor authentication, so that my account is protected from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: The login system must use multi-factor authentication. Data must be encrypted during transmission and storage to ensure security and compliance with financial security standards.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can securely log in with multi-factor authentication. 2. Data is encrypted during transmission and storage.
test_cases: Given a user, when they attempt to log in, then they must successfully authenticate using multi-factor authentication and data must be securely transmitted and stored.

title: Implement Session Management and Timeout
description: As a system administrator, I want session management and timeout features for users, so that user sessions are safeguarded against unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: User sessions must be automatically timed out after a period of inactivity. Users must be able to log back in securely.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User sessions time out after inactivity. 2. Users can log back in securely.
test_cases: Given an inactive user session, when the timeout period has elapsed, then the session must be ended and the user must log back in to continue.

title: Provide Self-Service Password Management
description: As a portal user, I want self-service options for password management and recovery, so that I can manage my credentials without assistance.
attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to reset their passwords securely using self-service options.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can securely reset passwords. 2. Users can securely manage their credentials.
test_cases: Given a user, when they need to reset their password, then they must be able to do so securely using self-service options.

epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Design Framework
title: Design Responsive UI for All Devices
description: As a portal user, I want a responsive user interface, so that I have a consistent experience across all my devices.
attributes_and_rules: The user interface must automatically adapt to desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The user interface is responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
test_cases: Given a user, when accessing the portal on any device, then the user experience must be consistent and adaptive to the device.

epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Design Framework
title: Implement Accessibility Best Practices
description: As a system administrator, I want the portal to be compliant with international accessibility standards, so that all users can access the portal easily.
attributes_and_rules: Portal must meet international accessibility standards.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal is compliant with accessibility standards. 2. All users can access the portal regardless of disabilities.
test_cases: Given a user with disabilities, when accessing the portal, then the user must be able to use all functionalities as per accessibility standards.

title: Develop Secure Integration Services
description: As a system administrator, I want to develop secure integration services, so that the portal can connect with the core banking system securely.
attributes_and_rules: Integration services must use secure protocols and ensure reliable data exchange.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal can securely connect with the core banking system. 2. Data exchange is secure and reliable.
test_cases: Given the portal and the core banking system, when integration services are developed, then data must be exchanged securely and reliably.

title: Implement APIs for User Account Data Retrieval
description: As a developer, I want to implement APIs for retrieving user account data, so that the portal can display accurate information from the core banking system.
attributes_and_rules: APIs must be implemented for user account data, product eligibility details, and transaction summaries.
acceptance_criteria: 1. APIs can retrieve user account data. 2. APIs can retrieve product eligibility details. 3. APIs can retrieve transaction summaries.
test_cases: Given the core banking system, when APIs are implemented, then the portal must be able to retrieve user account data, product eligibility details, and transaction summaries.

title: Validate Integration with Test Data
description: As a QA engineer, I want to validate the integration using test data, so that we can ensure the correctness before live deployment.
attributes_and_rules: Integration must be validated thoroughly using test data before live deployment.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Integration is validated with test data. 2. Any issues are resolved before live deployment.
test_cases: Given test data, when validating integration, then all functionalities must work correctly before moving to live deployment.

title: Build User-Specific Dashboard
description: As a portal user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view relevant products, services, and account information based on my profile.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard must display information relevant to the user’s profile and eligibility.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The dashboard displays user-specific information. 2. Information is based on the user’s profile and eligibility.
test_cases: Given a user, when accessing their dashboard, then they must see relevant products, services, and account information based on their profile.

title: Include Summary Views of Active Accounts
description: As a portal user, I want to see summary views of my active accounts, pending requests, and recent interactions, so that I have a quick overview of my account status.
attributes_and_rules: Summary views must include active accounts, pending requests, and recent interactions.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The dashboard shows summary views of active accounts. 2. The dashboard shows pending requests. 3. The dashboard shows recent interactions.
test_cases: Given a user, when viewing their dashboard, then they must see summary views of active accounts, pending requests, and recent interactions.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Implement Workflow for Account Opening
description: As a portal user, I want to be guided through the account opening process, so that I can open new accounts online with minimal hassle.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow must guide users with clear instructions and validation checks.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can open new accounts with minimal hassle. 2. The process includes clear instructions and validation checks.
test_cases: Given a user, when opening a new account, then they must be guided and able to complete the process with clear instructions and validation checks.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Implement Workflow for Service Modifications
description: As a portal user, I want to modify existing banking services online through guided workflows, so that I can manage my services conveniently.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow must guide users with clear instructions and validation checks for service modifications.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can modify services conveniently. 2. The process includes clear instructions and validation checks.
test_cases: Given a user, when modifying a service, then they must be guided and able to complete the process with clear instructions and validation checks.

title: Enable Save and Resume for Incomplete Applications
description: As a portal user, I want to save my incomplete applications and continue later, so that I can complete my tasks at my convenience.
attributes_and_rules: Temporary data must be securely stored and users must have clear navigation for retrieving saved applications.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can save incomplete applications. 2. Users can retrieve and resume applications seamlessly.
test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when a user saves it, then the user must be able to retrieve and resume the application later.

title: Implement Real-Time Status Tracking for Requests
description: As a portal user, I want real-time status tracking for my requests, so that I can monitor the progress and completion timeline.
attributes_and_rules: The status tracking system must provide real-time updates on user requests.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can track request status in real-time. 2. The system provides updates on progress and completion timelines.
test_cases: Given a user request, when tracking status, then the user must receive real-time updates on the progress and completion timeline.

title: Configure Automated Email Notifications
description: As a portal user, I want to receive automated email notifications for the key stages of my requests, so that I am promptly informed about the progress.
attributes_and_rules: Email notifications must be automated and sent at key stages of user requests.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users receive automated email notifications at key stages. 2. Notifications must be timely and provide relevant information.
test_cases: Given a user request, when reaching key stages, then the user must receive automated email notifications promptly.

title: Maintain Detailed Logs of User Interactions
description: As a system administrator, I want to maintain detailed logs of all user interactions, so that we can ensure transparency and compliance.
attributes_and_rules: Logs must include timestamps, request types, and status changes and adhere to regulatory compliance.
acceptance_criteria: 1. All user interactions are logged in detail. 2. Logs must adhere to compliance and data retention policies.
test_cases: Given a user interaction, when logging the event, then the system must record detailed information following compliance policies.

title: Develop RBAC Mechanisms for User Access Control
description: As a system administrator, I want RBAC mechanisms, so that user access levels are controlled and secure.
attributes_and_rules: Roles and permissions must be configured appropriately, and RBAC must be integrated with the authentication system.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User access levels are controlled using RBAC. 2. RBAC integration with the authentication system ensures security.
test_cases: Given different user roles, when accessing the portal, then only permitted services must be accessible based on user roles.
